sentences.english: Our team blanked the visiting team 2-0.
sentences.chinese: 我們球隊以2比零勝了客隊。

sentences.english: Now the visiting team is ahead.
The home team lost to the visitors 2 to 3.
sentences.chinese: 主隊以二比三敗於客隊。

sentences.english: No road team has won a title in Game 7 since 1978.
sentences.chinese: 自從1978年久沒有一支客隊能在搶七大戰中贏球。

sentences.english: But let's talk about the real away fans.
sentences.chinese: 然後讓我們來談談真正的客隊球迷。

sentences.english: The visitors will come back next Sunday to play off the game stopped by rain.
sentences.chinese: 客隊將於下星期日回來賽完因雨而中斷的比賽。

sentences.english: Saudati's goal in the 55th minute was decisive.
sentences.chinese: 紹達蒂在第55分鐘的進球助客隊拿到關鍵三分。

sentences.english: The match was a walkover for the visiting team.
He rambled on at great length but I couldn't make head or tail of what he said.
sentences.chinese: 主隊雖然技術不錯，也架不住客隊合作得好。

sentences.english: The visiting team has lost to the local team 7-12 in the quarterfinal .
sentences.chinese: 在四分之一決賽中客隊以7比12輸給了主隊。

sentences.english: The visitors came back the next Saturday to play off the game stopped by rain .
sentences.chinese: 客隊於下週六再回來賽完因雨而中止的比賽。

sentences.english: The goal was crucial because after that Kaiserslautern had to change their game plan.
sentences.chinese: 這個球是非常重要的，因爲之後客隊被迫改變策略。

sentences.english: All of the 8,000 tickets set aside for the visitor section have already been sold.
sentences.chinese: 全部8，000張爲客隊球迷預留的球票已銷售一空。

sentences.english: The visitors mayhave dominated possession, but the hosts' back four stood their ground.
sentences.chinese: 客隊的控球時間很長，但主隊的四名後衛堅守陣地。

sentences.english: The crowd began to barrack the visiting team.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆開始朝客隊喝彩起鬨。

sentences.english: Our team got the best of the visitors in the last quarter.
sentences.chinese: 我隊在最後四分之一比賽中戰勝了客隊。

definition: to mess sth up/to screw up
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
